title: WhatsApp is working on a dedicated “Community” tab
content:
After rolling out new voice messaging features to all users, WhatsApp is now working on a dedicated “Community” tab. We first learned about the tab in early March. Now more details have emerged about this upcoming feature. According to WABetainfo, WhatsApp will soon introduce a dedicated Community tab on Android and iOS. It would appear

The post WhatsApp is working on a dedicated “Community” tab appeared first on xda-developers.
description: WhatsApp will soon introduce a dedicated Community tab on Android and iOS. It will appear on the left side, replacing the camera shortcut.
